mdRecord.dcterms:title: Visiting speaker Kathleen Turner
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Heuchert, Dan
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Speaking to about 200 UVa drama students in the Helms Theatre on October 30, 1996, the day before the Virginia Film Festival officially began, Kathleen Turner answered their questions for the better part of an hour, before rushing off to introduce her 1994 John Waters comedy Serial Mom.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Visual History Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: University of Virginia
University of Virginia. News Office--Press coverage
